content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help.

It sounds like you have a solid plan in place to reach out to your connections and gather valuable feedback and insights for your marketing strategy. Remember to be respectful of their time, prepared, and open-minded during your conversations.

By prioritizing your outreach efforts and managing your conversations effectively, you'll be able to gather valuable insights from multiple people in your network. This will help you develop a more effective marketing strategy and increase the chances of success for your side project.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, good luck with your outreach efforts, and I hope you get some amazing feedback and insights from your connections!

Remember to stay organized, take notes, and synthesize the feedback you receive. This will help you identify patterns, themes, and areas for improvement in your marketing strategy.

You got this!
